question: i am 47 years old and type 1 diabetic. i gained 30 pounds right after i was put on paxil . this was year 2001. i am off paxil since 2002 but since can not get the weight off. i exercise a least 4 times a week. treadmill 45 minutes a time and curves. i wanted to know what reasons could be for my not being able to drop the weight.  before i used the paxil i was always thin and was able to lose excess weight. thanks
title: weight issues and diabetes type 1
